price: [Se les dirá:] Diríjanse a lo que desmentían [el Infierno].
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā mā kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
